verses.text: \w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* this \w word|strong="H1697"\w*, ye \w kine|strong="H6510"\w* of \w Bashan|strong="H1316"\w*, that \add are\add* in the \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w* of \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*, which \w oppress|strong="H6231"\w* the \w poor|strong="H1800"\w*, which \w crush|strong="H7533"\w* the \w needy|strong="H0034"\w*, which \w say|strong="H0559"\w* to their \w masters|strong="H0113"\w*, \w Bring|strong="H0935"\w*, and let us \w drink|strong="H8354"\w*.

The \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd* hath \w sworn|strong="H7650"\w* by his \w holiness|strong="H6944"\w*, that, lo, the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w* upon you, that he will take you \w away|strong="H5375"\w* with \w hooks|strong="H6793"\w*, and your \w posterity|strong="H0319"\w* with \w fishhooks|strong="H1729"\w*.

And ye shall go \w out|strong="H3318"\w* at the \w breaches|strong="H6556"\w*, \w every|strong="H0802"\w* \add cow at that which is\add* before her; and ye shall \w cast|strong="H7993"\w* \add them\add* into the \w palace|strong="H2038"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 4.3 \ft cast…: or, cast away the things of the palace\f*

¶ \w Come|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Beth-el|strong="H1008"\w*, and \w transgress|strong="H6586"\w*; at \w Gilgal|strong="H1537"\w* \w multiply|strong="H7235"\w* \w transgression|strong="H6586"\w*; and \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* your \w sacrifices|strong="H2077"\w* every \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*, \add and\add* your \w tithes|strong="H4643"\w* after \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w years|strong="H3117"\w*:\f + \fr 4.4 \ft three…: Heb. three years of days\f*

And \w offer|strong="H6999"\w* a sacrifice of \w thanksgiving|strong="H8426"\w* with \w leaven|strong="H2557"\w*, and \w proclaim|strong="H7121"\w* \add and\add* \w publish|strong="H8085"\w* the free \w offerings|strong="H5071"\w*: for \w this|strong="H3651"\w* \w liketh|strong="H0157"\w* you, O ye \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 4.5 \ft offer: Heb. offer by burning\f*\f + \fr 4.5 \ft this…: Heb. so ye love\f*

¶ And I also have \w given|strong="H5414"\w* you \w cleanness|strong="H5356"\w* of \w teeth|strong="H8127"\w* in all your \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*, and \w want|strong="H2640"\w* of \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* in all your \w places|strong="H4725"\w*: yet have ye not \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* unto me, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

And also I have \w withholden|strong="H4513"\w* the \w rain|strong="H1653"\w* from you, when \add there were\add* yet \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w months|strong="H2320"\w* to the \w harvest|strong="H7105"\w*: and I caused it to \w rain|strong="H4305"\w* upon \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, and caused it not to \w rain|strong="H4305"\w* upon \w another|strong="H0259"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*: \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w piece|strong="H2513"\w* was \w rained|strong="H4305"\w* upon, and the \w piece|strong="H2513"\w* whereupon it \w rained|strong="H4305"\w* not \w withered|strong="H3001"\w*.

So \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \add or\add* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w wandered|strong="H5128"\w* unto \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, to \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*; but they were not \w satisfied|strong="H7646"\w*: yet have ye not \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* unto me, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

I have \w smitten|strong="H5221"\w* you with \w blasting|strong="H7711"\w* and \w mildew|strong="H3420"\w*: when your \w gardens|strong="H1593"\w* and your \w vineyards|strong="H3754"\w* and your fig \w trees|strong="H8384"\w* and your olive \w trees|strong="H2132"\w* \w increased|strong="H7235"\w*, the \w palmerworm|strong="H1501"\w* \w devoured|strong="H0398"\w* \add them:\add* yet have ye not \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* unto me, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 4.9 \ft when…: or, the multitude of your gardens, etc. did the palmerworm\f*

I have \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* among you the \w pestilence|strong="H1698"\w* after the \w manner|strong="H1870"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*: your young \w men|strong="H0970"\w* have I \w slain|strong="H2026"\w* with the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, and have taken \w away|strong="H7628"\w* your \w horses|strong="H5483"\w*; and I have made the \w stink|strong="H0889"\w* of your \w camps|strong="H4264"\w* to come \w up|strong="H5927"\w* unto your \w nostrils|strong="H0639"\w*: yet have ye not \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* unto me, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 4.10 \ft after…: or, in the way\f*\f + \fr 4.10 \ft and have…: Heb. with the captivity of your horses\f*

I have \w overthrown|strong="H2015"\w* \add some\add* of you, as \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w overthrew|strong="H4114"\w* \w Sodom|strong="H5467"\w* and \w Gomorrah|strong="H6017"\w*, and ye were as a \w firebrand|strong="H0181"\w* plucked \w out|strong="H5337"\w* of the \w burning|strong="H8316"\w*: yet have ye not \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* unto me, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

Therefore thus will I \w do|strong="H6213"\w* unto thee, O \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: \add and\add* \w because|strong="H6118"\w* I will \w do|strong="H6213"\w* this unto thee, \w prepare|strong="H3559"\w* to \w meet|strong="H7125"\w* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, O \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

For, lo, he that \w formeth|strong="H3335"\w* the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w*, and \w createth|strong="H1254"\w* the \w wind|strong="H7307"\w*, and \w declareth|strong="H5046"\w* unto \w man|strong="H0120"\w* what \add is\add* his \w thought|strong="H7808"\w*, that \w maketh|strong="H6213"\w* the \w morning|strong="H7837"\w* \w darkness|strong="H5890"\w*, and \w treadeth|strong="H1869"\w* upon the high \w places|strong="H1116"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, The \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, \add is\add* his \w name|strong="H8034"\w*.\f + \fr 4.13 \ft wind: or, spirit\f*
